metadata.synopsis: Minsc shouts to unsummon Boo (after using the inventory item or Boo dies).

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: You have done enough, Boo! Come and rest in my pouch.
0.context: NodeContext: Said when Boo is unsummoned. We never see where Boo goes, so the implication of 'pouch' should deepen the reader's existential crisis with every repetition.
